pointOfSale

Class ReceiptLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • pointOfSale.ReceiptLoader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class ReceiptLoader
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener
    Author:
    Stephen Collins, Vanessa Harris, Kolter Bradshaw, Cristhian Ramirez (Date: 4/24/2013) Purpose: Reads text files generated from the transaction screen which contain saved transactions (receipts). These saved receipts are displayed on the ReceiptPanel object which is a component of the AdminGUI class. This class is a component of the AdminGUI class.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ReceiptLoader()
      Arranges all components in this class onto a JPanel and reads all saved receipt text files, displaying the text files names in a JList

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void actionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent event)
      Responds to user input by loading or deleting saved receipt text files
      private void deleteAll()
      Private helper method which removes all receipt files from the JList and from the System
      private void deleteReceipt()
      Private helper method which deletes a receipt, removing it from the JList and saving the change to the system.
      private void readReceipts()
      Private helper method which is called to read the text files stored in the system
      private void saveReceiptList()
      Method called to save any changes made to the receipt text file data
